rules.name: ContactsMissing
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 6) AND 2) OR ((3 OR 7) AND 4 AND 5)
rules.label: Contacts Missing

Flow.description: 11/10/2022 Cas Hefti: added a message that this flow will be deprecating soon
Flow.label: Prepare DocuSign Envelope

recordLookups.description: In the end-state this solution will support many templates. To prevent the need for one screen element per template we manage screen component visibility through a Custom Metadata Type.
recordLookups.name: GetEnvelopeScreenVisibilitySetting
recordLookups.label: Get Envelope Screen Visibility Setting

fields.name: ErrorTextNoAccountFound
fields.fieldText: In order to create a contract document we need information from the related Account. Please relate an Account to this Opportunity before proceeding.

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: Something went wrong! We don't know what information is relevant for the template you selected. Please contact you're Salesforce Admin for assistance.

fields.name: disErrorText
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong during this process due to the following error:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}


Please retry if you understand what goes wrong, otherwise reach out to your System Administrator.

fields.name: ValidaionMessageMissingContact
fields.fieldText: We're still missing some key information! Please click 'Previous' and make sure all fields have a value.

fields.name: OpenDocuSignDescription
fields.fieldText:
All the preparations are done! Click 'Go To DocuSign' to finalize the document and send it out.


*If your contract requires pricing please make sure you have a pricing document ready before continuing to DocuSign. You can prepare a pricing document here if you haven't done so already.

fields.name: EaesyTempDeprecateMessage
fields.fieldText:
The EasyTemp flow will be deprecated by the end of the year. Most standard contracts (no red-lining / adjustments) can be sent through the Contract Creator (link) in the Backoffice.


More info on the Contract Creator can be found on the Hub (link)

fields.name: selectTemplateDescription
fields.fieldText:
Please select the template you would like to use.


This flow is not to be used for non-standard contracts (deviating terms that need to go by legal, or uncommon contracts). Also, don't forget to create and add your Pricing Schedule if needed.

subflows.description: DocuSign Recipients are based on Salesforce Opportunity Contact Roles. For now we assume that the SelectContractSignatory screen element is always populated.
subflows.name: UpdateOpportunityContactRoles
subflows.label: Update Opportunity Contact Roles
